actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to limit the use of limousines.

summary.text: Limousine Conservation Act - Provides that a government agency may not, except as otherwise specified in this Act, purchase, lease, or maintain motor vehicles for the purpose of carrying an employee, appointed, or elected official between his home and his place of employment except: (1) where approved, on a case-by-case basis, by the head of the agency concerned; or (2) during outpatient medical service by a medical officer. Provides that this Act shall not apply to specified officials, including the President, the head of each executive department, and the Justices of the U.S. Supreme Court. Limits the motor vehicle use for all such officials except the President to one each.

titles.title: A bill to limit the use of limousines.
